鬡字的基本解释

鬡
níng
〔鬇鬡〕见“
鬇”。

鬡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［níng］
［《廣韻》女耕切，平耕，娘。］
(1)毛发蓬乱貌。参见“鬇鬡”、“鬡鬚”。
(2)凶恶可憎貌。参见“鬇鬡”。

鬡字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　鬡； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1457第08
【廣韻】女耕切【集韻】尼庚切【韻會】泥耕切，?音儜。鬇鬡，髮亂貌。或作鬤。

鬡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鬡字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
níng
〔鬇鬡〕See "
鬇".
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［níng］
["Guangyun" female ploughing cut, flat ploughing, mother. ]
(1) Unkempt hair. See "鬇鬡", "鬡 shall".
(2) Fierce and hateful appearance. See "Fuhu".
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Xianzi Department】　鬡; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1457 Page 08
[Guang Yun] Female ploughing and cutting [Jiyun] Nigeng cutting [Yunhui] Mud ploughing and cutting,? Sound. Fu, messy appearance. Or make a scorpion.
